name: Liam Mccluskey
description:
Code Jabba is a job board for software engineers. For candidates, it provides 10+ job search filters including coding language, skill/framework, salary and more. It also provides notifications for updates to job application statuses.
For recruiters, Code Jabba offers unlimited job posts with a seamless application review pipeline including the ability to send instant notifications to candidates about application status updates.
